orders.name: getOrders
orders.description: Returns paginated list of orders. Supports filtering by status and date range.
orders.use_case: Delta sync: filter by lastmodifieddate >= last_sync_timestamp. Use limit=200 for efficiency.

orders.name: getOrder
orders.description: Returns full details for a single order including line items, buyer, and shipping address.
orders.use_case: Retrieve a single order by eBay order ID. Line items ARE included (unlike Amazon).

orders.name: createShippingFulfillment
orders.description: Marks an order as shipped with tracking information.
orders.use_case: Submit tracking number after order is dispatched. Required to release payment on some eBay programs.
gotchas: shippedDate cannot be in the future.

orders.name: getShippingFulfillment
orders.description: Returns details of a specific shipment for an order.
orders.use_case: Verify that a shipment was recorded correctly.

catalog.name: createOrReplaceInventoryItem
catalog.description: Creates or fully replaces the product data (title, description, images, aspects) for a SKU.
catalog.use_case: First step of listing flow: create the inventory item (product). Then create an offer (price/listing).
gotchas: This creates product data only â€” it does NOT create a live listing. You must also createOffer and publishOffer.

catalog.name: bulkCreateOrReplaceInventoryItem
catalog.description: Creates or replaces up to 25 inventory items in a single call.
catalog.use_case: Preferred for catalog sync. Use batches of 25 to minimize API calls.

catalog.name: getInventoryItem
catalog.description: Returns product data and availability for a specific SKU.
catalog.use_case: Verify a product's current state before update.

catalog.name: getInventoryItems
catalog.description: Returns a paginated list of all inventory items for the seller.
catalog.use_case: Fetch full catalog for reconciliation. Use limit=200.

catalog.name: createOffer
catalog.description: Creates a listing offer (price, quantity, category, policies) for an inventory item.
catalog.use_case: Second step of listing flow: attach listing details to an inventory item. Must be published to go live.

catalog.name: publishOffer
catalog.description: Publishes an offer to make it live on eBay.
catalog.use_case: Third and final step: activate the listing. Returns a listingId on success.
gotchas: A published offer IS a live eBay listing. Validate before publishing.

catalog.name: bulkPublishOffer
catalog.description: Publishes up to 25 offers in a single call.
catalog.use_case: Use for batch listing activation during catalog sync.

catalog.name: bulkUpdatePriceQuantity
catalog.description: Updates price and/or quantity for up to 25 SKUs in one call.
catalog.use_case: Price and inventory delta updates. Most efficient endpoint for repricing and stock updates.

catalog.name: withdrawOffer
catalog.use_case: Delist a product that is out of stock or discontinued.

inventory.name: bulkUpdatePriceQuantity
inventory.description: Updates the price and/or available quantity for up to 25 SKUs.
inventory.use_case: Primary endpoint for inventory delta sync. Use for stock level updates.

fulfillment.name: createShippingFulfillment
fulfillment.description: Submit tracking information for a shipped order.
fulfillment.use_case: Required step after order dispatch to complete eBay's fulfillment flow.

reports.name: getTrafficReport
reports.description: Returns listing traffic data (impressions, clicks, conversion rate).
reports.use_case: Analyze listing performance. Useful for pricing and catalog optimization decisions.

returns.name: getReturn
returns.description: Returns details of a buyer return request.
returns.use_case: Retrieve return details for processing. Note: returns use the separate Post-Order API.

returns.name: issueRefund
returns.description: Issues a refund to the buyer for a return.
returns.use_case: Process refunds once returned item is received and inspected.
